decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 24001 (P) 101_B PROPOSED GROUND PLAN (received on 16.10.2024); 24001 (P) 102_B PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN; 24001 (P) 103_A PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR PLAN; 24001 (P) 104 PROPOSED ROOF PLAN; 24001 (P) 111_A PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION (NORTH FACING); 24001 (P) 112_A PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION (SOUTH FACING); 24001 (P) 113_A PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION (FACING WEST); 24001 (P) 114_A PROPOSED SECTION;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments in relation to planning permission reference 240420FUL dated 09/09/2024 for 'Conversion of single dwellinghouse into 4 self-contained residential units with associated cycle parking and refuse storage and amenity space; two storey side extension (following demolition of existing single storey side extension and garage); demolition of front porch extension; single storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of three rooflights to front roofslope', seeking for amendments to proposed front rooflight, windows and internal layout as well as installation of an additional rooflights.
